text: Antonín Jaroslav Liehm (March 2, 1924 – December 4, 2020) was a Czech-born writer, publisher, translator, and scholar. He was born in Prague. He was known for the founder of the Lettre International. Liehm died on December 4, 2020 in Prague at the age of 96.Famed Czech film critic Antonín J.
